txt.en: Aragorn is outside the city of Pelargir, and wishes to discuss the course of the battle with you.
Talk to Aragorn at his camp outside Pelargir

'The Corsairs have occupied the city, looting and pillaging from the moment their feet left the decks of their ships. Let us storm the city and retake it from our enemies! They have burned most of Gondor's fleet, but they will not retain the port!'

Aragorn makes ready to lead his forces into the port city of Pelargir and reclaim it from the Corsairs of Umbar.

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the battle, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'Retaking Pelargir' from the menu. After you successfully complete the battle, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>

'The Corsairs have occupied the city, looting and pillaging from the moment their feet left the decks of their ships. Let us storm the city and retake it from our enemies! They have burned most of Gondor's fleet, but they will not retain the port!'

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the battle, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'Retaking Pelargir' from the menu. After you successfully complete the battle, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>
Complete 'Retaking Pelargir' from the Epic Battles Panel
Book 2, Chapter 8: The Battle of Pelargir
The Corsairs have taken the port city of Pelargir, and now the time has come to drive them into the sea!

'Most of the Corsairs have fled in terror, their morale and their resolve broken, but we must be certain they are defeated.'

You tell Aragorn about Balakh√¥r the Scourge and your encounter on his flagship.

'I think you are right, [placeholder]. He is the key to ending the threat of Umbar. We have to find him and put an end to his leadership of the Corsairs.'
